channel.title: Alotic - Grand Exchange - Eco
channel.description:
[QUOTE=Alotic;4462026][CENTER][img]http://www.alotic.org/banner2.gif[/img] [SIZE=3]Free to Play | Virus Free | Economy | Grand Exchange | Minigames | Bossing [url=http://www.alotic.org]Click here to join the adventure today![/url][/SIZE]
[I]Alotic is based off of the 2011 era of RuneScape (668 revision) with very little amounts of custom additions. Our goal is to be a successful economy server with moderate experience rates. Meaning, to achieve a level 99 it will take some effort. We understand the demand and popularity of PvP based features and we will do our best to implement as much of them, and many other types of content as possible.[/I] [/CENTER] [SIZE=5]Activities[/SIZE]
[ul][*]God Wars [*]Barrows [*]Warriors Guild [*]Fight Caves [*]Dueling [*]Clan Wars[/ul]
[SIZE=5]PvP[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Fully working prayer books [*]Fully working spell books [*]Correct multi zones [*]Flawless switching [*]Perfect prayer delays for Hybrid and NH fights.[/ul]
[SIZE=5]PvM[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Tormented Demons [*]Corporeal beast [*]Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms [*]Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons [*]King Black Dragon [*]Several more![/ul]
[SIZE=5]Skilling[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Nearly every skill can be trained to achieve a Max cape. (We currently have 20/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/ul]
[SIZE=5]Misc[/SIZE]
[ul][*]Unique never before used Home area! [*]Grand Exchange [*]Unique system used for transportation. [*]Friends Chat [*]Achievement system [*]Curses & All spell books. [*]Quests (Coming soon) [*]Much more, come have a look![/ul]

@project-ufo wrote:

[QUOTE=Alotic;4462026][CENTER]
[SIZE=3]Free to Play | Virus Free | Economy | Grand Exchange | Minigames | Bossing
Click here to join the adventure today![/SIZE]

[I]Alotic is based off of the 2011 era of RuneScape (668 revision) with very little amounts of custom additions.
Our goal is to be a successful economy server with moderate experience rates. Meaning, to achieve a level 99 it will take some effort.
We understand the demand and popularity of PvP based features and we will do our best to implement as much of them,
and many other types of content as possible.[/I]
[/CENTER]
[SIZE=5]Activities[/SIZE]

[ul][]God Wars
[]Barrows
[]Warriors Guild
[]Fight Caves
[]Dueling
[]Clan Wars[/ul]

[]Fully working spell books

[*]Perfect prayer delays for Hybrid and NH fights.[/ul]

[]Corporeal beast
[]Desert, Jungle, Ice strykewyrms
[]Green, Blue, Black, Iron, Steel, Brutal, Mith dragons

[]Several more![/ul]

[SIZE=5]Skilling[/SIZE]

(We currently have 20/25 trainable skills with more to come)[/ul]

[]Grand Exchange
